tool_description: An API showing a random Love quote
name: Love  quote
title: Love  quote

api_list.name: Get a random love quote
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a random love quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://love-quote.p.rapidapi.com/lovequote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "love-quote.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://love-quote.p.rapidapi.com/lovequote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "love-quote.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
